The vnfortvnate lovers a tragedie : as it was lately acted with great applause at the private house in Black-Fryers by His Majesties servants / the author William Davenant ... D'Avenant, William, Sir, 1606-1668.
[8], 47, [1] p.
Printed by R.H. and are to be sold by Francis Coles ..., London : 1643.
Pepys referred to this play as The ungrateful lovers. First ed. Cf. NUC pre-1956. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
=======
